---

## 1. Context & Intent
- **Purpose**: What high-level business problem does this solve?
- **Stakeholders**: Who is the primary user?

## 2. Functional Requirements (User Stories)
- [ ] As a [user], I want to [action], so that [value].

## 3. Technical Constraints & Design Decisions
- **Tech Stack**: (e.g., Next.js, Tailwind v4, Prisma)
- **API/Schema Changes**: Describe new endpoints or data models.

## 4. Edge Cases & Failure Scenarios
- [ ] What happens if the network is offline?
- [ ] How does the system handle invalid user input?

## 5. Definition of Done
- [ ] Feature passes all automated tests.
- [ ] No new security vulnerabilities introduced.
